name: Do Wolves Dream of Rabbits? [Tomokazu R15]
name_original: Do Wolves Dream of Rabbits? [Tomokazu R15]
description:
"I'm here to be your bride."

.

.

.

A fangame for TomoxKazuha  pairing from Genshin Impact. Can be installed immediately on mobile/tab for Android. For IOS users, please refer to the guide below.

- A kinetic novel (more than 2,5 hour  playthrough)

- Pairing is Tomox Kazuha from Genshin Impact, with mentioned ThomaxSora/Aether and ThomaxAyaka. R15

- Genre is : romance/drama/mystery. It contains horror elements and slight jumpscare but nothing really scary. 

- The story is loosely based from my Ao Yori Aoshi AU from twitter but I've bumped Kazuha's age so he's older! 

- CW : Omegaverse Alternate Universe, feminization, waifufication, implied sexual assault for other character (not the main characters).

- Beware of how self-indulgent the story is. 

>>>>>>>>IOS GUIDE

 - install KochoVN app! 

- download the .kocho file 

 - just plug the file in that app, you can play immediately with ease^^

Twitter @ emilebois.
